title: Add developer documentation for validating CoinGecko debug fetch via dfx

requirements.summary: Add a developer-facing documentation file with the exact dfx deploy and test commands for debugFetchCoinGecko (BTC/ETH/XRP) using canister name itsron_crypto_backend.
acceptanceCriteria: Repo contains a new documentation file (e.g., under a `docs/` directory or in `README.md`) with the deploy command and the three `dfx canister call` examples for BTC/ETH/XRP exactly as provided by the user (user-facing text in English).
The documented commands, when run after deployment, successfully execute against the local/dev environment without requiring code changes to follow the steps.

file_operations.description: Create developer documentation in English that includes the exact commands provided in the BuildRequest to deploy and test raw CoinGecko responses via dfx using canister name `itsron_crypto_backend`, covering BTC, ETH, and XRP.
